preqs: ATS1959 or approval by unit co-ordinator

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS1016, ATS1036, ATS2016, ATS2036, ATS3016, ATS3036}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1959}

description: This unit introduces students to a number of additional basic conceptual and practical issues in Chinese translation studies. It is aimed at improving students' intercultural and inter-lingual communication skills through various translation projects and critical reading of a range of different representations of Chinese translation works. Through the study of Chinese and Western translation history, students will be able to enhance their translation skills. In addition, translation analysis is also introduced.
